title: kanakaangaka
sahitya:
kanakAngakA sukhA guhA dinam kA murugA tirumAn marugA



anupallavi



anaghA amala pannagAbharana hara guru parAtparA shubhakara



caraNam



aDiyEn nAn uyya aruLvAi nI tuyya amita sadbuddhi aparimita bhaktiyODum

ninnai Etti uyar kumara kIrtiyura kavi kunjaradAsan enaik
